name: Fabula Mortis
description: Fabula Mortis is a first person shooter based on steampunk and old fairy tales.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6950 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0C compliant sound card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Fabula Mortis is a steampunk fairy-tale based shooter. Sounds interesting?  Yup, until you realize it's a PvP only game, with a dead community.  Sure... They do have bots, but they instantly aim your face with incredible precision.  I couldn't even last an hour, please be careful.   PS: The price tag is excessive.
This game is totally dead... 0 servers, 0 players... And it costs 11.99 euro... -_-
Its so Good game  Things from cod :)
what a shame............ nice steampunk..really,,,love the character design...concept is good too.. but y it is soooo lag when i play with bots!!! I would say yes to this game...
